name: Monsterplants vs Bowling - Arcade Edition
description: Kill the plants with bowling balls! MonsterPlants vs Bowling offers an asymmetric cooperative experience. Defend your backyard with your teammate thanks to the projectiles at your disposal: customized bowling balls! ** New level coming in January!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 Storage: 700 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GTX 1060 Storage: 1000 MB available space
